summary: I OWN A BRITAX MARAHON CHILD SAFETY SEAT MANUFACTURED AUGUST 15, 2002.  (IT WAS IN BATCH NUBMER 502948, MODEL NUMBER E9L0636 AND SERIAL NUMBER E9L06361824.)  IT IS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT, IF NOT NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE, TO TIGHTEN THE SAFETY STRAPS.  IT IS MY UNDERSTANDING THAT BRITAX HAS CHANGED HOW THEY LOOP THIS STRAP SINCE THIS SEAT WAS INITIALLY SOLD.  THEREFORE, I AM CONCERNED ABOUT THE SAFETY OF THIS SEAT.  *JB
